traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The shaman is a 3rd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following Wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, minor illusion * 1st level (4 slots): color spray, grease, mage armor * 2nd level (2 slots): blindness/deafness, enlarge/reduce

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.
